Name: Monsieur Lecroix
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of lime zest twist.
Express lime zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Chocolate and cognac with the merest splash of orange liqueur still leaving this drink on the dry side.
History: Adapted from a drink created in 2010 by Klaus St. Rainer at Schumann's Bar, Munich, Germany.
Nutrition: One serving of Monsieur Lecroix contains 256 calories
